title: Question on ranked decay
body: I noticed I had a statement say I needed to play ranked or else my elo would decay in 8 days. I then won 2 games with my friend in ranked and logged off for 5 minutes. I then logged back in to the same decaying message. Is there a certain AMOUNT of games I need to play to stop my decay or is that a bug?

replies.body: I am currently in LP decay but there are Ranked Queue Issues so i can't play, will this issue stop my decay for the time being?

You need to [**play games in the queue that is getting ready to decay**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760#h3q1). I went ahead and checked your account, and it looks like you're Plat in Flex and Diamond in Solo. You're going to need to play a match in both of those queues to stop the decay on both of them.
